alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 23 at 3:27AM PST until December 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of up to one half of an inch. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Oregon, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon, Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon and North Central Oregon. In Washington, Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Washington and Simcoe Highlands. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 4 AM PST Sunday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia River Gorge of Oregon; Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; North Central Oregon
